title: Won promos but didnt rank up

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I was in promos for bronze 1 and I didnt rank up I won one game and lost another then won the last but I didnt rank up. It just said series complete and then i went to my profile still bronze 2 with 100 LP. Is this a new bug in this patch 1 of my friends had the same problem.

http://imgur.com/a/woYUb

Please fix this.
thanks

replies.body: I'm not sure what the issue was, but it looks like it fixed itself. You're Bronze 1 now :V
